description:
The next CirqueHaus Festival is November 1-3 in New York City and we can‚Äôt wait for you to see what we have in store for this round!
 
The CirqueHaus Festival is a one of a kind acro and movement festival featuring expert teachers sharing their knowledge on partner acrobatics, handstand, flexibility and more!

name: Morocco Acro Retreat 2024
location: Ounagha, Morocco, undefined, Morocco, Africa
description:
Discover a perfect platform to reconnect with your body and empower your mind. Enjoy a unique week of acroyoga, relaxation and yoga workshops, immerse in vibrant Moroccan nature and culture, and nourish your body with healthy organic meals.   Discover serenity at the intimate Villa Dar Zitoon, a boutique retreat nestled near the World Heritage UNESCO listed city of Essaouira.  La Vida Surf's founders have chosen this location for the outstanding nature and vibrant culture of Morocco, therefore it is natural for us to incorporate the unique combination of these elements into your retreat.   With La Vida Surf, you will enjoy both an active retreat and relaxing vacation, through practicing acroyoga, integrating with nature and experiencing the highlights of Moroccan culture.

name: Certified 50HR Acroyoga Training (Level 1 - Foundations) Nov 2024
location: Om Ham Retreat & Resort, Banjar Junjungan, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali, Indonesia, undefined, Indonesia, Asia
description:
Join us for a journey that will unlock your full acroyoga potential, have you flying high, and lifting your friends to new heights. You will learn key acroyoga techniques, partnership/teamwork, communication skills, safety essentials, and build your trust and confidence in a community of new friends.

THIS IS FOR YOU...
This course is perfect for you if you find yourself answering 'YES' to any of the following questions:

Do you want to truly master every detail of the foundational poses, moves and techniques of acroyoga?
Do you want to improve your teamwork and communication, and become a great acroyoga training partner?
Do you wish to bring more joy, fun, presence and connection into your Yoga practice?
Do you often want to join and enjoy an acroyoga event, but you feel not quite skilled or knowledgeable enough?
Do you want to finally unlock your handstand and learn effective inversion drills, that you can apply to your acroyoga practice?
Do you dream of doing Acroyoga, but you have no experience yet?
This training will give you the tools, techniques, and experience to achieve all of this and more!

At the end of this 1 week you can expect to become a solid and skilled AcroYogi You will be experienced enough to become a valued acroyoga training partner. Plus you will be confident and comfortable collaborating with Acroyogis.

Then you can grow your acroyoga skills with the foundations you learn during this training. 

OUR TEACHING PHILOSOPHY
AcroSpirit‚Äôs approach to the practice and teachings of Acroyoga goes far beyond the physical skills!

We see Acroyoga as a beautiful pathway to greater connection, communication, teamwork, trust, empathy, support, friendship and play. Together we grow, learn and share this incredible practice with each other to reach new heights both figuratively and literally!

We strongly stand for unity, inclusiveness and empowering each other to rise together beyond our individual limits. Through Acroyoga we become more than a community, we become a family.

YOUR LEAD TEACHERS
LAURA ILONA & CASPIAN BURRELL
Caspian Burrell and Laura Ilona are the Lead Teachers guiding this training. They are both professional yoga teachers, with backgrounds in martial arts, and are incredibly skilled and passionate when it comes to Acroyoga.

Caspian is the founder of AcroSpirit and his aim in teaching is to introduce this practice to more people, and pass on the many benefits and joys it has brought into his life, to others. Laura also loves sharing the joy and connection that acro brings, and she utilises her professional teaching knowledge and excellent communication skills to great effect.

Together they will lead you through this 1 week journey to truly level up your acro practice!

WHAT'S INCLUDED
AcroSpirit Level 1 Manual - (100+ color pages with detailed information and pictures to help your practice).
AcroSpirit goodie bag
AcroSpirit t-shirt
The full teaching course content
2 meals per day provided at the venue
Professional photoshoot during the course
Personalized coaching, tips and advice from our Lead teachers
Certificate upon successful completion (accredited with Yoga Alliance as 50hrs continued education)
Accommodation at the venue during the training (options available if needed)
THE COURSE
We have carefully crafted and developed this training to guarantee that you‚Äôll walk away with a solid foundation in your Acroyoga practice. The content we have selected is designed to teach you the foundational techniques of all the different aspects of Acroyoga. As well as sharing the non-physical skills this practice will unlock for you.

WE FOCUS ON:
Teaching and practicing supportive and positive communication.
Teaching correct alignment and technique. 
Practicing all roles (base, flyer, spotter) in Acroyoga.
Safety and the art of good spotting.
L-base Acroyoga Poses, Therapeutic Acroyoga Poses, Acroyoga Theory, Handstands, Thai Yoga Massage.
WHAT TO EXPECT
Every day will start with warm ups and prehab to train fundamental movements in our bodies and prepare you for the rest of the day‚Äôs activities. The handstand classes will give you the most valuable exercises, tips and techniques to improve your handstands and inversions. During the L-Base Acroyoga classes you will learn and practice in detail several Acroyoga poses and transitions. Several theory classes are scheduled throughout, providing valuable knowledge about communication, consent, training partnerships, injuries and much more. Late afternoon and evenings are mostly dedicated to the therapeutic side of Acroyoga. Designed to teach you to give and receive both Acroyoga therapeutics and Thai Yoga massage. 

All the content is created to deliver the most all round and valuable acroyoga experience.

Day Schedule Example:
07.30 - 08.30     -     Warm ups, prehab and handstands
08.30 - 09.30     -     Breakfast
09.30 - 10.30     -     Acro Theory: Safety
10.30 - 12.30     -     Acro Class
12.30 - 14.00     -     Lunch
14.00 - 15.00     -     Acro Theory: Communication
15.00 - 17.00     -     Acro Class: Entries and Exits
17.00 - 18.30     -     Thai Yoga Massage
18.30                  -      Dinner

CERTIFICATION
As part of your training, you will be required to demonstrate an Acroyoga sequence or series of poses and movements with your fellow students. You will have a short written examination focussed on techniques, alignment, and Acro theory topics such as safety, communication, and anatomy. Successful graduates of the course will receive a certification of completion which is accredited as 50hrs continued education credits with Yoga Alliance.

We believe that whether your intention is to eventually teach Acro, to become more advanced in Acroyoga, or just to deepen your connection, communication and friendships. This training and experience will allow you to unlock all of that and more!

EXPERIENCE LEVEL
This training is open to, and suitable for students of all levels, even those with NO previous experience in Acroyoga. Beginners and low level Intermediate Acroyogis will be able to learn a lot from this training, as we dive deep into alignment, techniques, refining the basics, and also giving focus to communication, training partnerships and communication skills. 

If you have never done Acroyoga before, this course is perfect for you as we teach from the basics up. We do recommend at least having some kind of movement practice. Such as Yoga, or any sports practice to help you get the most out of this training.

LANGUAGE
We welcome all nationalities and languages, and Acroyoga is a practice that uses non-verbal communication too! But please be aware that all our course materials and lessons are delivered in clear and easy to understand spoken and written English.

FOOD
All dietary requirements will be catered for from gluten free, vegan, vegetarian and more. You can choose each day from an incredible tasty selection of local indonesian cuisine, but with western infusions and options too.

ACCOMODATION
If you wish to stay at the resort location where we will hold the training, beautiful luxury rooms are available to book. All rooms come with ensuite showers, air conditioning and a modern clean style, with double bed or twin bed options if you wish to share.

PRICES
The pricing options are all-inclusive of training course, training manual, certification, 2 meals per day, goodie bag and t-shirt.
EARLY BIRD prices apply for the first 6 sign ups.

BOOK YOUR SPOT
Acroyoga is a practice that will give you so much, even beyond the amazing physical skills. In this training you will form deep friendships, find meaningful connections, and learn to communicate, play and have fun in a genuine way. This experience and the skills you gain will transform your understanding and approach to the most important form of contact in your everyday life - human connection!

Book your spot to reserve your place on this incredible training.

We can‚Äôt wait for you to become part of our AcroSpirit family!


  Email: acrospiritcontact@gmail.com


  FB: null


  IG: null

name: Acroatia 2025 - 10th anniversary
location: Fratrovci, Hrvatska, undefined, Hrvatska, null
description:
Our 10th edition! We are so proud and excited to have made it to the 10th time that we will be hosting you in our wild wild Croatian acrobatic festival.

In our humble beginnings in 2016 we envisioned a festival that is a unique blend of nature and acrobatics. (Re)connecting to the ground, the trees, life itself and yourself as well, has been something we love to combine with movement and the acro community.

The highlight of that is what will happen in 2025 for our anniversary edition.

Hot TiP
Sign up to our newsletter to get early access to the festival tickets. You can choose 1, 2 or 3 weeks. We have 20 tickets that will go for an insanely low price. Registration opens, early access via newsletter: November11th 2024.

Visit our webpage for much more info...

name: ACROSPIRIT PRE-FESTIVAL Intensive 2025
location: The Yoga Barn, Jalan Sukma Kesuma, Peliatan, Gianyar Regency, Bali, Indonesia, undefined, Indonesia, Asia
description:
Don't miss out on this epic pre-fest event with 2 of Europes best teaching duos - Pri and Anna and Acrolinks (Jessica and Marco)!

‚Äã‚ÄãJoin these incredibly skilled teachers for an intense three-day training that will have you whipping, popping and throwing all kinds of crazy skills! 

All 4 teachers are masters of Icarians, Whip-pops, Hand to Hands and much more. Over the course of the 3 days pre-fest they will provide the drills and progressions building up to skills like Foot Juggling, Back Tucks, No Hands Castaways, Mortalitos, Podcheskas, and so much more.

Don‚Äôt miss your chance to get their high-level coaching and learn from some of the best acro teachers in the world.

This event is prior to the AcroSpirit Acroyoga Bali Festival and a great way to prepare for the festival.

 

WHAT TO EXPECT
PRE-REQS: (ALL PREREQS SHOULD BE COMFORTABLY PERFORMED WITHOUT SPOTTERS)
L-base Hand to Hand

Two High

Tarzan Whip

Icarian Throne to Bird and Bird to Throne

Some Experience in Standing Hand to Hand (with spotter is okay)


Over the course of the pre-festival you can expect focused training sessions working on drills and progressions to unlock advanced acro skills. The aim will be to give time to practice and learn tricks in a safe and progressive way that builds up to some satisfying attempts at big acro skills.

Sessions will be focussed on a set/area of skills, for example standing hand to hands and podcheskas, or front tucks and no hands castaways.


  Email: acrospiritcontact@gmail.com


  FB: null


  IG: null

This year we are growing the festival by moving to a new and bigger venue‚Ä¶ The Yoga Barn!

And we are adding more time for jamming, a greater variety of classes, and expanding to 5 concurrent workshops each round over the 4 full festival days, so there will be tonnes of workshops for you to choose from!

This year we are creating the most skilled acro teacher lineup we've ever had to inspire, share and help you learn amazing new acro skills!

Dont miss out on Bali's biggest acro event.

name: ACROSPIRIT NYEPI ACROYOGA RETREAT 2025
location: Nirarta Centre for Living Awareness, Jalan Raya Tebola, Telaga Tawang, Karangasem Regency, Bali, Indonesia, undefined, Indonesia, Asia
description:
Retreat yourself to 4 days and 3 nights of acro, fun, relaxation and connection in the most amazing nature resort centre with our amazing acro community!
 

NYEPI ACROYOGA RETREAT

Be part of a special acroyoga retreat experience during the unique Balinese holiday of Nyepi, the Day Of Silence.

After success of collaborating with Acro Nerds for Nyepi retreat 2024 we're excited to bring them back for our next year edition.

You will spend 4 days and 3 nights in a beautiful retreat center in Sidemen, Bali, together with our AcroYoga community, all under the guidance of our highly skilled acro teachers and retreat hosts.

During the retreat you will get 5 acro classes, acro jams,Intelligent movement sessions,handstand workshop, consent & communication session, connection games and a fantasticcommunity atmosphere!

‚ÄãIt‚Äôs going to be epic, memorable and deeply connective, so don‚Äôt miss out!

name: Elevate Acro Festival
location: Alberta Avenue Community Centre, 118 Avenue Northwest, Edmonton, AB, Canada, undefined, Canada, North America
description:
ELEVATE your acro practice, each other, and the community with this 3 day acro yoga festival October 18-20th in Edmonton, Alberta.

Come join us for Edmonton's small (under 200 people) Acro Festival 

Elevate Acro Festival will host teachers from across North America. We will have various workshops including beginner, intermediate, advanced , and all levels classes. There will be 3 classes running simultaneously in each time slot and there will be 2 separate spaces at the venue for acro classes to minimize noise from simultaneous classes. This is a beginner friendly festival AND we recommend having done at least a few acro classes before attending to get the most out of the festival.

Diversity is a core value at elevate and we partner with BACCES (BIPOC Collective Care Ecosystem), have social justice chats, have gender non specific washrooms, a chill blanket fort if you are overstimulated or need a break, a land acknowledgement activity, and do our best to continue learning and unlearning how to create a safer space for marginalized folxs in the community. Aiden Flyguy (one of the festival organizers) is queer and transgender.

SCHEDULE
FÔªøriday Prefest with Adi Firefly & Devon French
Friday: 2 acro classes + Jam Time on October 18 starting at 4pm
Saturday: 3 acro classes + 1 Restorative Practice Workshop + Community Chat + Community Games + and Jam Time October 19
Sunday: 2 acro classes + Community Chat+ 1 massage class on October 20


  Email: elevateacrofest@gmail.com


  FB: null


  IG: null

name: Acroyoga Training Program (Level 2 - Intermediate Advanced) Jan 2025
location: Om Ham Retreat & Resort, Banjar Junjungan, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali, Indonesia, undefined, Indonesia, Asia
description:
Are YOU READY to take the next BIG STEP in your acroyoga journey?
‚ÄãThis training program will help you break through the intermediate barrier and UNLOCK ADVANCED ACRO SKILLS. Plus you will learn how TEACH and COACH acro in the most effective and impactful way!

At the end of this 1 week Acroyoga Training Program you will develop the techniques, skills and knowledge to grow your practice to an advanced level. You will learn and be able to implement many valuable teaching and coaching tools to make your acro teaching highly effective. 

You will gain new inputs to your training approach and methodology, and experience a shift and significant level up in your physical practice.

This course has been designed to provide you with all of the technical and theoretical knowledge and skills needed to take your acroyoga practice beyond the intermediate level.

The content we will cover is the most essential and technically valuable in growing you towards an advanced acroyoga practice. We will focus on progressions, drills and understanding skills, so you will be able to continue to practice and develop after the training.

In the theoretical classes we will bring more focus to teaching and coaching techniques and practices, whilst looking deeper into professional development, advanced training tips, community leading and injury prevention/management.


  Email: acrospiritcontact@gmail.com

organizer.name: Acro Teacher Training and Leadership Retreat

name: Acro Teacher Training and Leadership Retreat
location: Lake Arrowhead, California, USA, undefined, United States, North America
description:
Lux believes that ongoing education is crucial to all practitioners, even more so for teachers. Since 2012, he has been offering a training to teachers whose passion is gaining knowledge and increasing aptitude.


In addition to the physical practice, participants will study:
‚Ä¢ Methods of communication & partnering
‚Ä¢ How to evaluate, diagnose, and offer students the greatest change in their practice without overwhelming them
‚Ä¢ Acro mechanics and the methods of communicating them
‚Ä¢ Softer skills including conflict resolution, leadership, and community support

This training focuses on techniques that will serve your students long-term. This is the essence of teaching: serve your students. Come learn how to teach with greater efficacy.

As in the past, there will be required reading and discussion of ethics of teaching and personal conduct as a teacher and community leader. Participants will be required to adhere to a code of conduct and a commitment to foster a culture of safe and progressive learning.

name: Arthur Davis returns to Philly
location: Philadelphia, PA, USA, undefined, United States, North America
description:
A weekend of training opportunities with two-time world champion acrobatic gymnast, an internationally renowned choreographer, a Cirque du Soleil alumni, and energy/bodyworker Arthur Davis III.

Friday 10/18 privates will be at Majesty Elite Gymnastics

Friday 10/18 workshop and jam will be at Reach Climbing Gym

Saturday 10/19 workshops and jam will be at Majesty Elite Gymanstics

Sunday 10/20 workshop and jam will be at Salvatore Pachella Memorial Field


Check out the program for details!

A little about Arthur:

Arthur Davis III is a two-time world champion acrobatic gymnast, an internationally renowned choreographer, a Cirque du Soleil alumni, and energy/bodyworker. Arthur‚Äôs approach to expression through movement is enlivening. He encourages everyone to be big, to inhabit one‚Äôs fullness. He celebrates and embodies exaggerating one‚Äôs unique expression. His intuitive and joyful expression is magnetic and light. His guidance in this process is healing, transformative, and fun.

We are fortunate to have Arthur come back and share his talents and skills with our community in Philly. Acrobats from all around are welcome with open arms. I hope we can show Arthur our support and enthusiasm for this weekend.

For inspiration on Arthur's work

name: Acro Wonderland
location: 4304 Metric Drive, Winter Park, FL, USA, undefined, United States, North America
description:
**Acro Wonderland 2024**

Join us in Orlando, Florida, for Acro Wonderland! 

A thrilling three-day acrobatic event featuring world-class instructors from all around. This festival offers a blend of intensive workshops, exciting jams, and lively parties that continue until midnight on Friday and Saturday.

Acro Wonderland features a carefully curated schedule designed to offer something special for everyone. Whether you're a seasoned acrobat or just starting out, you'll find what you need here. With over 35 classes to choose from, this festival is the perfect place to enhance your skills and make magic happen.

Beginning with 6 hours of intensive workshops on Friday, followed by a magical tree lighting ceremony. Capture special moments with professional photos with The Acro Santa, and enjoy the Very Merry Holiday Extravaganza Showcase on Saturday!

 Acro Wonderland is not just another acro fest, we support Give Kids The World Village. This is a place where critically ill children and their families can go on cost free vacations in Orlando Florida. We believe the holiday season is about giving back. 

Don't miss your chance to participate in raffles to win incredible prizes that will elevate your acro practice. With a live DJ, festive atmosphere, and so much more, Acro Wonderland is the perfect way to make acro your holiday tradition.

 We can't wait to welcome you home!
Check us out at acrotown.com


  Email: info@acrotown.com
